items.sentence: If you're sure you're not in a hurry, I can use a little help.

Those with money can do things that those without money can't.
Have you ever asked yourself why Tom might think such a thing?
Tom was tired, but he decided it would be a good idea to walk.
Tom was late to work because he forgot to set his alarm clock.
Mary was adamant that Tom attend the birthing course with her.
If I were you, I wouldn't eat any of the mushrooms Tom picked.
I was hoping that you and I could get together this afternoon.
I want to know what to do with all the stuff you left with me.
